text:
CreativeLive | Platform, Front-End, Full-Stack, Data | San Francisco, CA | Full-time, onsite, SALARY:$120k-$200k

We provide online creative education, streaming live classes for free 24/7!

Want to learn Photoshop? Heavy metal audio production? Jewelry making? Getting more wedding photography clients? Come to https://creativelive.com/

Want to do cool work in Node/Angular/Mongo/Docker/Kafka/AWS? Talk to me. :-)

Software Engineer, Front-End (Entry Level) Software Engineer, Front-End (Senior/Mid-Level) Software Engineer, Platform (Senior/Lead) Software Engineer, Product Analytics (Senior/Mid-Level)

https://creativelive.com/jobs
